comments:
From an RCP plugin project, select the Text widget, MB2-->Widget selected.
It generated code but produces several Interal Errors in the .log file. 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.ui 4 10001 2005-04-25 09:44:16.380
!MESSAGE Internal Error
!STACK 0
java.lang.Exception: New line delimiter added to new code: 1310
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.DocumentAdapter.validateLineDelimiters(DocumentAdapter.java:431)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.DocumentAdapter.replace(DocumentAdapter.java:345)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.CodeExpressionRef.updateDocument(CodeExpressionRef.java:627)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.CodeExpressionRef.insertContentToDocument(CodeExpressionRef.java:721)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.BeanDecoderAdapter.addEventElement(BeanDecoderAdapter.java:341)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.BeanDecoderAdapter.notifyChanged(BeanDecoderAdapter.java:448)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.BasicNotifierImpl.eNotify(BasicNotifierImpl.java:229)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotificationChainImpl.dispatch(NotificationChainImpl.java:113)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotificationChainImpl.dispatch(NotificationChainImpl.java:101)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotifyingListImpl.addUnique(NotifyingListImpl.java:288)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.BasicEList.add(BasicEList.java:599)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.JavaBeanEventUtilities.addCallback(JavaBeanEventUtilities.java:308)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.JavaBeanEventUtilities.addCallback(JavaBeanEventUtilities.java:290)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.JavaBeanEventUtilities.addCallback(JavaBeanEventUtilities.java:263)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.JavaBeanEventsObjectActionDelegate$5.run(JavaBeanEventsObjectActionDelegate.java:180)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.cde.core.ModelChangeController.doModelChanges(ModelChangeController.java:161)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.JavaBeanEventsObjectActionDelegate$4.widgetSelected(JavaBeanEventsObjectActionDelegate.java:177)

The problem is that a javajet template uses the following for a line seperator:
protected final String NL = System.getProperties().getProperty("line.separator");

If the file was created on a different platform, JDT will try and use the "old"
platform seperator... the BDM uses this seperator.

Now that NL is not static anymore, we can force the NL for a template instance,
fSeperator is available to most templates (see AbstractMethodTextGenerator).

The NL field for the generated .java files is marked protected and final. Opened
enhancement bug 95680 against EMF requesting providing an API to set the NL.

For the time being we will hack a synchronized way of accessing a static API so
that we get the desired NL instead of the system property line.seperator.
We will need to pick up the next EMF drop, the JavaJet fix was released
Using the latest EMF driver I200505261142, a fix was released.

traces.message: New line delimiter added to new code: 1310
